game.name: Motorbike Stunts
game.description:
The summer season is about to come and you look pretty excited to ride your bike at speed on the road! You also love enjoying the wind in your hair. But, why you need to go on the road for this purpose when you enjoy bike driving in a realistic virtual environment? Come and join Motorbike Stunts game today and get ready to explore the best motorcycle riding experience in a way you always wanted! Do not forget to use the helmet to obey the traffic police rules and ride safely!
There are four amazing places to explore in this brand new bike game. You are sure to fall in love with this in case if you are crazy for the tricks/stunts. The entire platform is full of dangerous ramps and deadly bridges. You can use nitro for maximum acceleration and perform some death-defying flips to include yourself in the list of top bikers in this free online racing game. It will be amazing to ride your bike through the ramps and platforms that are very tall.Â 
Choose any bike out of the 8 bike models and explore any out of 4 maps to become a top biker of the city in this one of the best HTML5 games for kids! Select a bike and get ready to perform the dangerous cool motocross stunts in the air and try to collect the coins! Check out the instructions on the display before starting this bike driving game! You can press Tab to exist to main menu anytime during the gameplay. Explore our other popular bike games to get a pleasure of driving top bike models!
